sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchUserStudents } from "../services/studentServices" export const Home = ({ user }) => { const [userStudents, setUserStudents] = useState([]) const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchUserStudents(user.id).then((data) => { setUserStudents(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [user]) return (

Welcome, {user.firstName}

Anim aute id magna aliqua ad ad non deserunt sunt. Qui irure qui lorem cupidatat commodo. Elit sunt amet fugiat veniam occaecat fugiat aliqua.

{/* {links.map((link) => ( {link.name} → ))} */}
Students Added
{userStudents.length}
Worksheets Added
{"placeholder"}
) }
